h1_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
h2_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Boss Fight and Guide
content: When you've knocked his health bar down, he'll retreat and Top Takes Bottom will take over. She'll jump to get into her half of the ball and spin toward you. This will be quick, but you can dodge out of the way of this. She will also imitate Bottom Takes Top and leap up with her sword, eventually rolling into her half of the ball.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Top_Takes_Bottom,_Bottom_Takes_Top.md', within the main section titled 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top', specifically from the subsection 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When you've knocked his health bar down, he'll retreat and Top Takes Bottom will take over. She'll jump to get into her half of the ball and spin toward you. This will be quick, but you can dodge out of the way of this. She will also imitate Bottom Takes Top and leap up with her sword, eventually rolling into her half of the ball.
